item.title: Dog park
item.description: My attempt to lure both Anja and myself outside for some fresh air and a walk was thwarted as soon as I learned the place was out of my favorite bubble tea. We strolled to Flevopark, in my hand an ice cream cone, and on my face the disappointment of a toddler who canâ€™t be satisfied. The park has a wide field that allows loose dogs to roam freely in the off-season.
